hero.description: We build web platforms and mobile apps for businesses looking to establish or grow their digital presence. Based in Macedonia, working with clients locally and internationally.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Feedback from businesses we have worked with.

items.quote: Working with GoDevLab was a great experience. They are always open to communication, dedicated and professional, which makes the collaboration easy and enjoyable. We can confidently say they are reliable partners and gladly recommend their services to anyone looking for a dependable and effective team.
Professional approach, creative solutions and support at every step - highly recommend. Our website was completed on time and with excellent quality - the team really knows what they are doing.

services.title: What We Build
services.description: Digital products engineered for scale, performance and long-term growth.

uiux.stat: Design systems applied across all GoDevLab products

process.title: How We Work Together
process.description: A straightforward process built around clear communication and predictable delivery.

discovery.title: Discovery Call
discovery.description: We start with a conversation to understand your business, goals and what you want to achieve. No obligation.

proposal.title: Detailed Proposal
proposal.description: We send a written proposal with a clear scope, timeline and fixed price. Everything is agreed before work begins.

design.title: Design Phase
design.description: Design work is reviewed and approved by you before development starts. We iterate based on your feedback.

development.title: Development
development.description: We share progress regularly through demos or staging builds. You can review and give feedback throughout.

testing.title: Testing & Launch
testing.description: The product is tested across devices and browsers before going live. We handle deployment and monitor the launch.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: Six months of bug fixes are included. We remain available after launch for questions, fixes and future work.

cta.text: Have a project in mind? Get in touch and we'll take it from there.

whyUs.title: Why Clients Choose Us
whyUs.description: We build lasting partnerships with businesses that value quality, reliability and honest communication.

onTime.title: On-Time Delivery
onTime.description: We scope projects carefully and communicate early if anything changes. Timelines are set realistically and respected throughout.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Every project starts with a fixed-price quote after thorough scoping. You know exactly what you are paying before any work begins.

support.title: Post-Launch Support
support.description: Six months of bug fixes are included with every project. We stay available after launch to make sure everything runs as expected.

communication.title: Reliable Communication
communication.description: Regular updates through your preferred channel, with a response time under 24 hours. You always know where the project stands.

ownership.title: Full Code Ownership
ownership.description: Everything we build is yours — full source code, no licensing fees, no dependency on us to keep it running.

scalable.title: Built for Growth
scalable.description: We make sensible architectural decisions early so your product can scale without expensive rewrites further down the line.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.description: Answers to questions we hear most often.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still have questions?
stillHaveQuestions.description: Get in touch and we'll answer any questions about your project.

questions.question: How do you handle budget?
questions.answer: We provide fixed-price quotes after thorough scoping. If scope changes during the project, we discuss pricing transparently before any additional work begins — you won't be surprised by unexpected charges.

questions.question: I'm not technical-can I still work with you?
questions.answer: Most of our clients aren't technical, and that's fine. We explain things in plain language, handle the technical decisions, and keep you informed without the jargon.

questions.question: What happens if something breaks after launch?
questions.answer: Every project includes six months of bug fixes. If something breaks, we fix it at no extra charge. After that period, we offer maintenance plans if you need ongoing coverage.

questions.question: How do you keep projects on track?
questions.answer: We share progress through regular demos or staging builds so you can see where things stand throughout development. Milestones and timelines are agreed up front.

questions.question: How do you compare to working with a freelancer?
questions.answer: Working with a small agency means you get consistent communication, project management, quality assurance and post-launch support built in. The scope and price are fixed, not billed by the hour.

questions.question: How long will my project take?
questions.answer: Typical timelines: simple websites (2–4 weeks), web applications (6–12 weeks), mobile apps (8–16 weeks). We'll give you an accurate estimate after our initial conversation.

questions.question: Do you work with startups or just established businesses?
questions.answer: We work with both. We've helped early-stage companies launch their first product and supported established businesses with larger, ongoing projects.

questions.question: What if I need changes during development?
questions.answer: Changes are normal. Minor adjustments within scope are included. For anything larger, we'll discuss the impact on timeline and budget before proceeding. Regular demos help catch misalignments early.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Great
contact.description: Tell us about your project and get a free assessment within 24 hours

info.title: Prefer to Talk?
info.description: Book a free 30-minute call. No sales pitch, no pressure-just a conversation about your project and how we can help.

footer.description: We build the apps that grow your business. From idea to launch-and beyond.
